attributes.action: remove the requirement for compulsory payment of licence fee towards the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many people actually watch and enjoy the BBC? How many people prefer to watch non-BBC programmes? How many people watch non-BBC satellite channels and refute the requirement to pay for the BBC licence fee, just to watch their own TV, regardless of what programmes they tune in to?
How many people are happy to pay for the growing number of fines awarded against the BBC for inappropriate gameshow/telephone activities (we are paying for this!!!!)
How many people are happy about paying for the golden handshakes for those responsible for such inappropriate actions?
BBC, we will pay your licence fee for the moment but lets make it crystal clear your days of financial happiness are numbered...............
